original_text: Now a thing was secretly brought to me, and mine ear received a little thereof.
korean_text: 어떤 말씀이 내게 가만히 이르고 그 가느다란 소리가 내 귀에 들렸었나니

sentences.original_text: Now a thing was secretly brought to me
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 한 가지가 비밀리게 내게 전달되었고

sentences.original_text: and mine ear received a little thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 귀는 그것의 작은 부분을 받았다
